name: diviner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also dowser, uk/ˈdaʊ.zər/ us/ˈdaʊ.zɚ/) a person who divines for water or minerals
someone who claims to be able to say what is going to happen in the future using special powers or abilities: Henry consulted diviners when Anne Boleyn became pregnant, anxious to know whether he could expect a male heir.
